notes.text:
An update is available for containernetworking-plugins, python-podman-api, udica, cockpit-podman.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
The container-tools module contains tools for working with containers, notably podman, buildah, skopeo, and runc.

Security Fix(es):

* QEMU: slirp: OOB buffer access while emulating tcp protocols in tcp_emu() (CVE-2020-7039)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.1 Release Notes linked from the References section.

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: Red Hat CSAF document for RHSA-2020:0348

document.title: Important: container-tools:rhel8 security, bug fix, and enhancement update
